name: 2 days homestay to discovery the rural life in Vietnam's central highland
description: Do you want to be a Vietnamese farmer in 2 days? Do you want to know how a vegetable is planted? Do you want to enjoy Coffee at the headquarter of Coffee and take care the tree which gives us this fantastic drink? Do you want to fishing to relax and enjoy the peaceful life? Do you want to take care the lovely animals like: chicken, pig, dog, cat? Come and join with us - the children of Mountain Forest!
